TopicTitle: Different terrain shader quality for different planets

Articles.Content: Is it possible to have different terrain shader quality for different planets (terrain shader quality setting introduced in 1.8). I am having some lag and stutters when flying on Kerbin in 1.9 and I suspect it is due to the new terrain shaders added to it in the 1.9 update.

16 hours ago, Aniruddh said:

Is it possible to have different terrain shader quality for different planets (terrain shader quality setting introduced in 1.8). I am having some lag and stutters when flying on Kerbin in 1.9 and I suspect it is due to the new terrain shaders added to it in the 1.9 update.

currently no
